params.maxToPay: The max amount of cost to pay

buyWithLockedPrice(uint256).notice: buy income token with locked price

closeBilling().notice: manually close the billing by paying cost with user deposit.         In this case, the pool will be shrinked starting from current         mining token.

lockPrice().notice: lock price to buy income token in income token sale

resetShrink().notice: disable shrink. Token already shrinked will not be affected

tryBilling().notice: It will try to sell income token at Uniswap to pay bill and start income token sale if it fails
